Title: Restricts the locations of gunsmiths and dealers in firearms in relation to day cares, educational facilities, and places of worship
Summary: Restricts the locations of gunsmiths and dealers in firearms in relation to child day care or educational facilities, and places of worship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to restricting the locations of gunsmiths and dealers in firearms in relation to day cares, educational facilities, and places of worship
